target: Barnyard grass (Echinochloa crusgalli), Cyperus spp., Broadleaf weeds
application_method: Pre-emergence spray after transplanting when water layer is present; uniform spray for best control.
ppe_notes: Wear gloves and mask during application.
notes: Selective herbicide effective on grassy and some broadleaf weeds in paddy.

target: Phalaris minor (Canary grass), Avena fatua (Wild oat)
application_method: Pre-emergence spray 3 days after sowing for best weed control.
ppe_notes: Wear gloves and mask; avoid inhalation.
notes: Widely used selective herbicide for broadleaf and grassy weeds in wheat.

application_method: Pre-emergence or early post-emergence application for control of broad spectrum weeds.
ppe_notes: Use gloves and mask during handling.
notes: One of the most widely used herbicides in maize for controlling broad spectrum weeds.

target: Cyperus rotundus, Digitaria spp., broad leaf weeds
application_method: Pre-emergence soil application post planting for control of grassy and broadleaf weeds.
ppe_notes: Wear gloves during application.
notes: Effective soil applied herbicide for grass and broadleaf weeds in sugarcane.

application_method: Pre-emergence or early post-emergence application to soil and weeds ensuring thorough coverage; avoid spray drift.
ppe_notes: Use gloves and mask during handling.
notes: One of the most widely used herbicides in maize for controlling broad spectrum weeds.

application_method: Pre-emergence soil application soon after sowing; maintain adequate soil moisture for effectiveness.
ppe_notes: Wear protective gloves and avoid inhalation.
notes: Selective herbicide widely used in sorghum for weed control.

application_method: Pre-emergence application on soil immediately after sowing; avoid disturbing soil after application.
ppe_notes: Use gloves and protective clothing during application.
notes: Effective residual herbicide controlling both grassy and broadleaf weeds in pulses.

application_method: Apply pre-emergence spray after sowing; incorporate lightly into soil for best results.
ppe_notes: Wear gloves and protective clothing during mixing and spraying.
notes: Commonly used herbicide in cotton for early season weed control.

application_method: Post-emergence spray on young weeds and crop; ensure full coverage.
ppe_notes: Wear gloves, mask, and avoid drift.
notes: Selective herbicide effective against grassy weeds in sunflower.

application_method: Post-emergence spray during early weed stages; uniform coverage.
ppe_notes: Wear protective gloves and mask.
notes: A new combination herbicide offering broad-spectrum control against grassy and broadleaf weeds in wheat.

target: Brachiaria reptans, Digitaria sanguinalis, Cyperus rotundus
application_method: Post-emergence foliar spray targeting broadleaf weeds and grassy weed complexes.
ppe_notes: Use gloves and protective clothing during handling and application.
notes: Effective herbicide for control of complex weed flora in sugarcane with improved crop safety.
